apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Classic Game Emulator
apps.versionDescription: Added new N64 support and bug fixes.
apps.localizedDescription: Delta is a powerful and flexible emulator for iOS devices, supporting multiple classic consoles including Game Boy, Game Boy Advance, NES, SNES, N64, and more.

apps.name: PPSSPP
apps.subtitle: PSP Emulator for iOS
apps.versionDescription: Improved performance, updated compatibility with more PSP titles, and bug fixes for iOS builds.
apps.localizedDescription: PPSSPP is a fast and portable PSP emulator that allows you to play your favorite PSP games on iOS. Supports customizable controls, save states, texture scaling, and high-resolution rendering.

apps.name: ActiveGS
apps.subtitle: Apple IIgs Emulator for iOS
apps.versionDescription: Updated core for improved Apple IIgs emulation, better disk compatibility, and performance fixes on iOS.
apps.localizedDescription: ActiveGS is an Apple IIgs emulator for iOS. It allows you to run Apple IIgs software and games with high compatibility, disk image support, save states, and an on-screen keyboard and joystick.

apps.name: Ready
apps.subtitle: Home Computer Emulator for iPad
apps.versionDescription: Added preliminary support for ZX Spectrum 128k and improved VIC-20 emulation.
apps.localizedDescription: Ready is an open-source emulator for classic 8-bit home computers, including Commodore 64, VIC-20, C16, Plus/4, and ZX Spectrum. It provides a native iPad experience with support for disk images, keyboard input, and on-screen controls.

apps.name: DolphiniOS Beta
apps.subtitle: GameCube & Wii Emulator for iOS
apps.versionDescription: Rewritten codebase with improved performance and new features.
apps.localizedDescription: DolphiniOS is a port of the Dolphin Emulator to iOS, allowing you to play GameCube and Wii games on your device. This beta version includes a rewritten codebase with improved performance and new features.

apps.name: DolphiniOS
apps.subtitle: GameCube & Wii Emulator for iOS
apps.versionDescription: Stable release with improved performance and compatibility for GameCube and Wii games on iOS.
apps.localizedDescription: DolphiniOS is the official Dolphin Emulator port for iOS, allowing you to play GameCube and Wii games with high compatibility. This stable release includes all major features and improvements from development builds.

apps.name: iNDS
apps.subtitle: Nintendo DS Emulator for iOS
apps.versionDescription: Stable release with improved performance, bug fixes, and full Nintendo DS compatibility on iOS.
apps.localizedDescription: iNDS is a full-featured Nintendo DS emulator for iOS. Play your favorite DS games with save states, fast-forward, cheat support, and customizable controls.

apps.name: MAME4iOS
apps.subtitle: Arcade Emulator for iOS
apps.versionDescription: Stable release with improved arcade game support, controller compatibility, and bug fixes.
apps.localizedDescription: MAME4iOS is a full-featured arcade emulator for iOS, letting you play thousands of classic arcade games with support for save states, on-screen controls, and external controllers.

apps.name: GBA4iOS
apps.subtitle: Game Boy Advance Emulator for iOS
apps.versionDescription: Stable release with improved GBA game compatibility, controller support, and bug fixes.
apps.localizedDescription: GBA4iOS is a fully-featured Game Boy Advance emulator for iOS, allowing you to play your favorite GBA games with save states, cheat codes, fast-forward, and customizable on-screen controls.
